chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: &kdchart; is Klarälvdalens Datakonsult AB's charting package for Qt applications. This is the &kdchart; Programmer's Manual. It will get you started with creating your charts and provides lots of pointers to its many advanced features.

listitem.para: Depending on your &kdchart; version, you will find different INSTALL files that explain how to install &kdchart; on your platform and a step by step description about how to build it from sources.
&kdchart; also comes with an extensive Reference Manual generated directly from the source code itself.

chapter.para: You should refer to it in conjunction with this Programmer's Manual.

listitem.para: &kdchart; is a tool for creating business and engineering charts, and is the most powerful Qt component of its kind. Besides having all the standard features, it also enables the developer to design and manage a large number of axes and provide sophisticated means of layout customization. Since all configuration settings have reasonnable defaults you can usually get by with setting only a handful of parameters and relying on the defaults for the rest.
&kdchart; is used by a variety of programs for many different purposes.

The above example shows how &kdchart; is used for vizualizing flood events in a river; other samples on our website at http://www.kdab.net/kdchart show how &kdchart; is used for monitoring seismic activity. It is no coincidence that the current version of the KOffice productivity suite uses our library.
* Display a view with small diagrams and arrows showing how the main classes work together

sect1.title: What You Should Know
sect1.para: You should be familiar with writing Qt applications, as well as have a working C++ knowledge. When you are in doubt about how a Qt4 class mentioned in this Programmer's Guide works, please check the Qt4 reference documentation or a good book about Qt4.
Add some general information from the Getting Started File.

sect1.title: The Structure of This Manual
sect1.para: How we will proceed to present &kdchart; for Qt4
We provide you with lots of sample code and screen-shots. We recommend our readers to try and run the sample code and experiment with the various settings.

sect1.title: What's next
sect1.para: In the next chapter we introduce you to &kdchart; 2.0 new API.
